title: Little Sister Snow
creator: Frances Little
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Little Sister Snow by Frances Little. Read by Cheri Gardner. American author Fannie Caldwell, under pen name of Frances Little, tells the story of young Yuki San growing up in Japan circa early 1900s, and of her dreams of an American. (Introduction by Cheri Gardner) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; japan; family; buddha; christian; love; japanese culture
